Package gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.po

This package contains classes providing basic functionality relates to PersistentObject development.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractBasePo<K extends Key> Abstract base for implementation of PersistentObject.
AbstractKey Abstract basic implementation of Key.
AbstractModificationRecordPo<K extends Key> AbstractBasePo with ModificationRecord.
ChildAdder This utility makes it easier to add an element to a Child collection of a PersistentObject.
GetPoKey Gets the key of a PersistentObject or null if the specified object is not a PersistentObject.
MethodsBasedKey Implementation of Key that is based on an array of Method objects that are invoked on an object.
ModificationRecordAnalyzer Deprecated. Use ModificationRecordFieldsAnalyzer
PoCache<K extends Serializable & Comparable<? super K>,P extends PersistentObject<K>> Dynamic cache for persistent objects.
PoChildrenAnalyzer  
PoConditionChecker Condition checker that checks conditions about objects.
PoCopier Utilities for copying persistent objects.
PoFetcher Utility class that fetches PersistentObjects either from the data store or from a global cache.
PoLogger Utility class with specific logging functionality for persistent objects.
PoReattachAnalysis This adapter accepts an AbstractBasePo instance inspects its fields and produces a List of objects that may be considered for manual re-attaching to the Hibernate Session and a list of objects that are currently transient and should not be affected by the re-attachment process.
PoReattachAnalysis.PoReattachAnalysisResult Results bean
PoUtils Utilities for PersistentObjects.
ValuesBasedKey This class provides an implementation of AbstractKey that is based on an array of values.
 

Enum Summary
PoOperation Po operation states.
 

Package gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.po Description

This package contains classes providing basic functionality relates to PersistentObject development.
